ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Tavatron growled softly, her optics dull and emotionless. Though her fur was charred and blackened, and her armor singed and broken, she would NEVER give them

Tavatron growled softly, her optics dull and emotionless. Though her 
fur was charred and blackened, and her armor singed and broken, she 
would NEVER give them the satisfaction of hearing her scream.
Tavatron weakly pulled against the restraints. She knew it was
useless to struggle, even a Transmetal couldn't break these bonds. 
Tavatron raised her head slightly, straining her ears to detect the 
slightest sound. Nemesis appeared to be thouroughly enjoying himself, 
as did the other Alliance 'bots present. 

Tavatron laid her head against the cold steel table. There was
nothing she could do. She was completely and totally at the mercy of 
the Alliance, as was Iron Raptor. Tavatron took a deep breath as she 
slowly closed her eyes. She wasn't asleep, but what difference did it 
make either way? The light grenade had temporarily blinded her, 
besides, she really didn't want to see what Nemesis was looking for. 
She didn't want a knight, or some kind of crazy hero bursting through 
the door just in the nick of time. She wanted a chance to fight back, 
a chance to defend herself. Still, when she did get loose, and she 
would, she was going to kill Zardus.
